meanings.sent1: The doctor corrected the malpositions of the bones in the patient's foot.
meanings.sent2: The malpositions of the furniture made it difficult to move around the room.
meanings.sent3: The malpositions of the puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: The malpositions of the planets in the solar system created chaos in the galaxy.
meanings.sent5: The malpositions of the books on the shelf made it look messy and disorganized.

meanings.sent1: The archaeologist discovered the malpositions of ancient artifacts in the wrong tomb.
meanings.sent2: The malpositions of the keys on the keyboard caused typing errors.
meanings.sent3: The malpositions of the traffic cones confused the drivers on the road.
meanings.sent4: The malpositions of the chess pieces on the board led to an unexpected checkmate.
meanings.sent5: The malpositions of the paintings in the gallery changed the entire exhibition's layout.
